div.head: Page not found
div.p: You have entered a URL within the EpiDoc directory, but there is no page at this address. If you followed a link here from off-site, please could you inform the owner of that page that the link should be updated?

list.item: If you were looking for the EpiDoc Guidelines, you can find the table of contents at: http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/latest/
If you were looking for the EpiDoc Schema, you can find the latest stable version at: http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/schema/latest/tei-epidoc.rng
If you were looking for any other EpiDoc feature, you can probably find it from the EpiDoc home page at: epidoc.sourceforge.net

div.p: You will be redirected to the EpiDoc Guidelines front page in a few seconds.
